compatibility.notes: CC-BY-NC-2.5 is a non-commercial license, which limits its compatibility with commercial licenses.

key_requirements: You must provide appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made.
You may not use the material for commercial purposes.
You may not impose any additional restrictions on the rights granted by the license.
license.name: CC-BY-NC-2.5
obligations: Attribution must be given to the original author.
The work cannot be used for commercial purposes.
If modifications are made, they must be indicated.
The license must be included with any distribution of the work.
